job_title: Customer Service Manager in Yate, England
pros:
SOME (and very few) work colleagues have become my closest friends, they are all in one department at one site only!! 

Free gym membership to the gym and pool
cons:
Pay rates are poor! Expected to do champagne service for beer money! No real direction of what is even expected of you. Senior management all have different ideas on what sort of business it is and what to focus on. 

Bad cliquey staff cultures - if your external and new you don't stand a chance. 

Different rules for different people, policies and procedures ignored. Scruffy and untidy standards. 

Only able to get into classes if there is a space.
